About Me

2 years ago, I began as a Quality Assurance Engineer at Avant, LLC where I took ownership of MyBrainSolutions.com with respect to testing and documentation.

During that time, I coded on the side using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Late 2012, I took a serious study of Ruby and the Ruby on Rails framework, and later joined App Academy. I am now graduated and looking to join a development team full time.

If you're interested, shoot me an email or connect on LinkedIn.

You can also view my code repository here.
